metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3398 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Algorithmic complexity vulnerability in Moodle 1.9.x before 1.9.19, 2.0.xbefore 2.0.10, 2.1.x before 2.1.7, and 2.2.x before 2.2.4 allows remoteauthenticated users to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) by usingthe advanced-search feature on a database activity that has many records.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3398` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
